Bind all  Lightborne weapon skins. These skins can be crafted from recipes purchased from Ward Trader Sampaguita in Bava Nisos or by purchasing them from the Trading Post and binding them to you. 

Ward Trader Sampaguita can also craft Lightborne weapons at a premium if you have the proper materials.

requirement:
Gather  material from resource nodes.

<c=@reminder>Resource nodes are clumps of ore, saplings, and plants that can be gathered using gathering tools. Nodes can be found by exploring the world.</c>

Collect Charr Commendations for the legions by defeating Dominion forces and accomplishing objectives in the Drizzlewood Coast.

What is time to one who transcends it?

Note: Completion of this achievement requires completion of the Riding Skyscales achievement.

It will help locate the dead drops across Diessa Plateau and Wayfarer Foothills and then decrypt them for you.

Discover 5 waypoints in Snowden Drifts, Diessa Plateau, Brisban Wildlands, or Kessex Hills.

<c=@reminder>Waypoints allow you to travel quickly around the world. They are unlocked by visiting them once. You can teleport to any unlocked waypoint for a small amount of coin.</c>

Use your utility skills  time.

Purchase the Polychromatic Armor set from Deft Lahar in your homestead.
Unlocking one skin's weight unlocks the other weights' skins.

requirement: Use the diving goggles near the SCAR outpost.

requirement: Complete  event inside the Tower of Nightmares.

requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the mechanist's mace, Percussive Maintenance.

requirement: Complete  event in the Sandswept Isles.

Collect Charr Commendations for the legions by defeating Dominion forces and accomplishing objectives in the Drizzlewood Coast.

requirement:
Collect various teleportation gizmos. 

You can update progress for this achievement by traveling to Lion's Arch and meeting one of these conditions:
• You have the item in your inventory.
• You have put a scroll in a portal tome.
• You have completed a related achievement.

locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

Complete chapter 5 of your story.

<c=@reminder>You can select your active story and view your progress from the Story Journal menu in the Hero panel.</c>

Story Instance: Shining Blade Secrets

requirement: Check on some old friends in Cantha and make some new ones.

requirement: Complete "Meeting the Asura" after speaking with the challenge mote to activate challenge mode.

locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

Earn experience to level up this character to level 10.

<c=@reminder>Experience can be earned by defeating enemies, contributing to events and renown hearts, completing story chapters, and crafting items.</c>

Story Instance: Turnabout
It's raining cats and dogs out there.
Except the cats are Dominion ordnance, and the dogs are also Dominion ordnance.
requirement: Retreat to the base without being hit.

name: Selecting Crafting Disciplines
requirement:
Train in a crafting discipline from a crafting master.

<c=@reminder>Items can be crafted at crafting stations in cities and guild halls once you've been trained by an appropriate master craftsman. Crafting uses the crafting materials you collect from gathering nodes and defeated enemies as you explore the world.</c>

requirement: Conquer the titanspawn without going down.

Story Instance: Scion & Champion

Consider the finality of all things by meditating on the transience of power and glory throughout Tyria, all in order to take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor known as Dusk.

requirement: View a vista in one of the following Shiverpeak Mountains maps: Wayfarer Foothills, Snowden Drifts, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, Timberline Falls, and Frostgorge Sound.

locked_text: Unlock your home garden to access this collection.

requirement: Confront the Strangers among Lands.

requirement: Find the secret passage and secure some extra crystals for the fight.

requirement: Explore the mesas and follow the ornithologist's trail of clues to verify or disprove his hypothesis.

requirement: Purchase Koda's Hammer at the forge.

requirement: Complete the story chapter The Nightmare Ends.

requirement: Avoid all cannon fire and spinning traps.

requirement: Complete  specific "Champions" achievement.

requirement: Avoid getting hit by Branded Aurene's breath attacks.

Earn 10 crafting levels.

<c=@reminder>Craft items to earn crafting experience for that crafting discipline, allowing you to create more powerful items.</c>

Collect items related to Vishen Steelshot's history to earn her signature Steel Warband sniper rifle.

name: Jormag's Madness

Eternal life, either blessing or curse, squandered by greed and the thirst for power.

Note: Completion of this achievement requires completion of the Riding Skyscales achievement.
